name: Project Boost (Yawi)
description:
This is Project Boost: You are a skilled rocket pilot. Dodge obstacles and try and make it to the end.

I followed a tutorial on how to make the game, but with my own levels and graphics.

Tutorial: Unity 3D Game Development Course Udemy by Ben Tristem and Rick Davidson.

Disclaimer: Whenever you crash, you go back to the beginning level. It may be annoying.

Enjoy! I am open to feedback.
